## Action On Durability Change

---



[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/action_on_durability_change).

Executes entity actions whenever an item either gains durability, loses durability or breaks.

Type ID: `apugli:action_on_durability_change`



---
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Action On Durability Change

---



[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/action_on_durability_change).

Executes entity actions whenever an item either gains durability, loses durability or breaks.

Type ID: `apugli:action_on_durability_change`



---

slot.description: If specified, the action will only execute on this equipment slot. One of: `"mainhand"`, `"offhand"`, `"head"`, `"chest"`, `"legs"`, `"feet"`.
slot.markdownDescription: If specified, the action will only execute on this equipment slot. One of: `"mainhand"`, `"offhand"`, `"head"`, `"chest"`, `"legs"`, `"feet"`.

item_condition.description: If set, the item condition to check for before executing the action on the damaged item. If not set this is true all the time.
item_condition.markdownDescription: If set, the item condition to check for before executing the action on the damaged item. If not set this is true all the time.

increase_action.description: If set, these action(s) will be executed on the power holder when an item that meets the condition's durability increases.
increase_action.markdownDescription: If set, these action(s) will be executed on the power holder when an item that meets the condition's durability increases.

decrease_action.description: If set, these action(s) will be executed on the power holder when an item that meets the condition's durability decreases.
decrease_action.markdownDescription: If set, these action(s) will be executed on the power holder when an item that meets the condition's durability decreases.

break_action.description: If set, these action(s) will be executed on the power holder when an item that meets the condition breaks.
break_action.markdownDescription: If set, these action(s) will be executed on the power holder when an item that meets the condition breaks.

increase_item_action.description: If set, these action(s) will be executed on a condition meeting item when its durability increases.
increase_item_action.markdownDescription: If set, these action(s) will be executed on a condition meeting item when its durability increases.

decrease_item_action.description: If set, these action(s) will be executed on a condition meeting item when its durability decreases.
decrease_item_action.markdownDescription: If set, these action(s) will be executed on a condition meeting item when its durability decreases.

break_item_action.description: If set, these action(s) will be executed on a condition meeting item when its durability decreases.
break_item_action.markdownDescription: If set, these action(s) will be executed on a condition meeting item when its durability decreases.
